mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (login_id, gender_code, name, email, date_of_birth, phone_number, password, simple_password, personal_id_number, address, detail_address, zip_code) values (#{loginId}, #{genderCode}, #{name}, #{email}, TO_DATE(#{dateOfBirth}, 'YYYYMMDD'), #{phoneNumber}, #{password}, #{simplePassword}, #{personalIdNumber}, #{address}, #{detailAddress}, #{zipCode})
